profile.title: Personal Profile
profile.description: Traicy Marutla is a Bachelor of Commerce Industrial Psychology Graduate from the University of Johannesburg.

education.description: This course involves People Management, Includes majors in, Economics, Analyical Techniques, and Accounting

workExperience.description1: Building a positive online presence, creating and managing posts
workExperience.description2: Representing the Union on Television programs,ie. Expression on SABC
workExperience.description3: Was a part of a dedicated team of SLIs in the Thrive Student Living Accommodation, was involved in planning and overseeing open days and establishing mentorship programs
